sen.j: 二世梅若万三郎（にせい うめわか まんざぶろう、1908年（明治41年）3月23日 - 1991年（平成3年）4月21日）は、シテ方観世流能楽師。
sen.e: Manzaburo UMEWAKA the 2nd (March 23, 1908 - April 21, 1991) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school of lead actors (shite-kata).
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Second (March 23, 1908 - April 21, 1991) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).
sen.cmt: the 2nd→the Second、lead actors (shite-kata)→shite-kata (lead actor)としました。
sen.e: Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Second (March 23, 1908 - April 21, 1991) was a Noh actor of the Kanze school of shite-kata (lead actors).

sen.j: 梅若万三郎 (初世)の四男。
sen.e: He was the fourth son of Manzaburo UMEWAKA the 1st.
He was the fourth son of Manzaburo UMEWAKA the First.
He was the fourth son of Manzaburo UMEWAKA the First.

sen.j: 1948年万三郎を襲名とともに、梅若万三郎家の当主となる。
sen.e: He succeeded to the name of Manzaburo in 1948 and became the head of the Manzaburo UMEWAKA family.
He succeeded to the name of Manzaburo in 1948 and became the head of the Manzaburo UMEWAKA family.
He succeeded to the name of Manzaburo in 1948 and became the head of the Manzaburo UMEWAKA family.
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the 3rd is his eldest son.
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Third is his eldest son.
Manzaburo UMEWAKA the Third is his eldest son.
Masaharu UMEWAKA is his second son.
Masaharu UMEWAKA is his second son.
Masaharu UMEWAKA is his second son.
